items.value:
Shield
Past students of the school who tried to escape from Baldi have created a shield to protect themselves, but
since it's used, it will only protect for 20 seconds

Calculator
This device was stolen from school faculty for those who don't have time to solve problems!
Very powerful and helps well in <color=red>hard</color> situations!

Potion of speed
Do you like to run, but don't like detention?
Just drink this potion and you will become the fastest by almost half a minute!

Gravity Device
Is the shield too expensive for you? There is an alternative! Through joint development with a mysterious
person, you can change gravity yourself!
(due to a weak battery, its action is limited to 15 seconds)

Glue
This is Johnny's own glue, if you pour it out, then everyone will have to go around it so as not to get stuck

Ice Bomb
Freeze everyone for 5 seconds and after freezing make them slower

Magic Ruby
That's strange magic ruby can make portals! But, only one, and you can return to place where you use last time!

Time Rewinder
Strange device which can rewind characters moves for 5 seconds back
